alert.note: Alert for Kenosha; Racine (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Beach Hazards Statement issued August 06 at 3:12AM CDT until August 06 at 9:00PM CDT by NWS Milwaukee
info.description: ...BEACH HAZARDS STATEMENT IN EFFECT FROM NOON CDT TODAY THROUGH THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Life threatening waves of 3 to 4 feet and dangerous currents are expected. * WHERE...Racine and Kenosha Counties. * WHEN...From noon CDT today through 9 PM CDT this evening. * IMPACTS...Dangerous swimming conditions are expected due to high waves and onshore winds. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... Several beaches that will be most susceptible to the dangerous swimming conditions include Shoop Park Beach in Racine... North Beach in Racine... Wind Point Lighthouse Beach in Racine... Simmons Island Beach in Kenosha...
info.instruction: Stay out of the water and away from dangerous areas like piers and breakwalls. Strong structural and longshore currents are expected. Rip currents are possible.
